original_text: There were four supports at the four corners of each stand. The supports were of one piece with the stands.
korean_text: 받침 수레 네 모퉁이에 어깨 같은 것 넷이 있는데 그 어깨는 받침 수레와 연결되었고

sentences.original_text: There were four supports at the four corners of each stand.
sentences.korean_translation: 각 받침대의 네 모퉁이에는 네 개의 받침이 있었다.

sentences.original_text: The supports were of one piece with the stands.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 받침들은 받침대와 하나로 되어 있었다.
